## Project thoughts

I am interested in exploring data related to diets in India as they vary across region and how they compare against Hindu nationalist laws banning the consumption of beef. Other covariates I want to explore are literacy rates as they vary across states, how prevalent the BJP is in state-level politics, and the regions over which the British Raj directly ruled versus indirectly ruled. I have observed some maps that show an interesting correlation of certain regions with higher literacy, lenient beef consumption laws, rice-based diets (instead of wheat), and indirect British rule.
